reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: IVA - VAT ATA FY'16. Assessments and Taxes - Value-added-taxes (REIMBURSABLE). PR5132734 - INL 1930.0 Inmigration equipment suppl. Recurring MOD in support of Regional Maritime and. IN13HNMS- 14/15 MOD TIGRES/TAG safe house utilitie. IN23HNM4 - 14/15-PR4888693 CENTROMATIC + PR5003429. IN41HNNC- 14/15 PR5133012: INL/CARSI Posta Lo. IPAC-USDA[Assessments and Taxes - Value-added-taxes (REIMBURSABLE)]. TPC INL/A Financial Analyst/Examiner. Assessments and Taxes - Value-added-taxes (NON-REIMBURSABLE). SCR-800-14GR-051;Mar Viva;10/01/2014-03/31/2016;

description.narrative: Post Support IVA - VAT ATA FY'16[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. IVA - VAT ATA FY'16[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Post Support[Covers payments of non-reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required; e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Equipment IVA - VAT ATA FY'16[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Equipment[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Post Support[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. IVA - VAT ATA FY'16[Covers payments of non-reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required; e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Venue[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Salaries IVA - VAT ATA FY'16[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Salaries[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Fees IVA - VAT ATA FY'16[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]. Fees[Covers payments of reimbursable value added taxes on purchases as required, e.g., in European Common Market countries.]

participating-org.narrative: RADIOMOVIL DIPSA S A DE C V
The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: In FY 2017, the United States will partner with Mexico to consolidate and institutionalize progress made as a result of ongoing bilateral cooperation, particularly through the Merida Initiative. By weakening transnational criminal organizations (TCOs), reforming the institutions that sustain the rule of law, protecting human rights, creating a 21st century border, and building stronger and more resilient communities, the United States and Mexico will ensure greater prosperity and inclusive economic growth on both sides of the border. To support the President's Global Climate Change (GCC) Initiative, a strong partnership with the Government of Mexico and other stakeholders will promote clean energy adoption, energy efficiency, low carbon development, and sustainable land use and forest management to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. Mexico is a global non-proliferation partner and related assistance will focus on enhancing Mexico's capabilities and commitment. Mexico continues to be a strong partner of the initiatives that complement the United States' programs to address the root causes of unlawful migration from Central America.
